description: Somehow the agent plugin code for the file_inject method has gotten dropped or was never merged.  I know Ed Leafe had done the code for it a while back (I've seen some past diffs), but somehow it's missing.  Need to find it and get it in.  vmops.py tries to call the method, but it's missing.
title: file_inject method missing from agent plugin

comments.content: Somehow the agent plugin code for the file_inject method has gotten dropped or was never merged.  I know Ed Leafe had done the code for it a while back (I've seen some past diffs), but somehow it's missing.  Need to find it and get it in.  vmops.py tries to call the method, but it's missing.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cbehrens
